means: 处于暂时搁置（或中止）状态
暂时搁置的，所有权未定的，暂缓执行的

sentence.Network_en: The matter was left in abeyance until Haig saw French.
sentence.Network_cn: 事情被搁置了起来，直到黑格见到法国人。

sentence.Network_en: The question is in abeyance until we know more about it.
sentence.Network_cn: 问题暂时搁置,直到我们了解更多有关情况再行研究.

sentence.Network_en: The law was held in abeyance for well over twenty years.
sentence.Network_cn: 这项法律被搁置了二十多年.

PerfectNetExp.abs: 雯雯婴童坊 - 上古神话 - 网易博客 ... abbreviation 缩写 abeyance 缓办，中止 abide 遵守.
【最新】GRE单词(红宝书)TXT完全版 - 豆丁网 ... abet v. 教唆，鼓励，帮助 abeyance n. 中止，搁置 abhor v. 憎恨，嫌恶.
GRE 词汇表(红宝书) - 豆丁网 ... abet v． 教唆，协助（罪犯） abeyance n． 中止，暂搁 abhor v． 憎恨，嫌恶.
雯雯婴童坊 - 上古神话 - 网易博客 ... abbreviation 缩写 abeyance 缓办，中止 abide 遵守.

list.abs: fall into a sleep 睡了一觉fall into abeyance 失效fall into company with 结伴
不要将所有的东西都以永恒的标准来看待,不要谴责不正常,我们应该将确定不正常的规则视为悬而未决(in abeyance)的。Elizabeth Grosz指出,自恋常常阻止我们去理解那些.
imputed cost 应计成本，估算成本in abeyance 悬而未决，犹未定夺in bond 在关栈中保税.
1. keep(hold) in abeyancebe in abeyance 暂定；未定go(fall) into abeyance 失效；延期
leave in 好像没有吧leave in abeyance 暂搁, 暂不实施leave in sb.'s care 把...交某人照看.

derivation.yuyuan_name: late 16th cent. (in the legal sense): from Old French abeance 'aspiration to a title', from abeer 'aspire after', from a- 'towards' + beer 'to gape'

entry.tran: 搁置;悬而未决;暂停使用
entry.def: If something is in abeyance, it is not operating or being used at the present time.

example.ex: The threat is likely to remain in abeyance until next year's meeting in Reykjavik.
example.tran: 这一威胁很可能会一直存在下去，直至明年的雷克雅未克会议。

example.ex: The matter was left in abeyance until Haig saw French.
example.tran: 事情被搁置了起来，直到黑格见到法国人。

auth_sentence.content: Rising stocks generally coax issuers into the capital markets, while jumpy markets tend to keep issuers in abeyance.
auth_sentence.res_content: Rising stocks generally coax issuers into the capital markets, while jumpy markets tend to keep issuers in abeyance.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Rising stocks generally coax issuers into the capital markets, while jumpy markets tend to keep issuers in abeyance.

sentences.en: after an abeyance of many years

means.word_mean: (法律、规则、习俗等)中止，失效，不复为人们所遵循

sentences.en: This custom has fallen into abeyance now.
sentences.cn: 这个风俗现在已经不时兴了。

sentences.en: The sanctions againt the country fell into abeyance yesterday.
sentences.cn: 对那个国家的制裁昨天中止。

sentences.en: This law falls into abeyance when the country’s security is threatened.
sentences.cn: 当国家安全受到威胁时,这项法规暂停实施。

means.word_mean: (法律、规则、习俗等)中止，失效，不复为人们所遵循
处于暂时搁置(或中止)状态，挂起来

sentences.cn: 搁置起来，暂时搁置，暂不实施，中止

sentences.en: Let’s hold that broblem in abeyance for a while.
sentences.cn: 咱们把这个问题搁一搁吧。

sentences.en: The decision is in abeyance until the returns from holiday.
sentences.cn: 那项决议在他度假回来之前一直搁置着。

sentences.en: The question is in abeyance until we know more about it.
sentences.cn: 问题暂时搁置，直到我们了解更多有关情况再行研究。

sentences.en: The law was held in abeyance for well over twenty years.
sentences.cn: 这项法律被搁置了二十多年。

means.word_mean: (法律、规则等)暂时失效，暂缓执行

sentences.en: The rule has been in abeyance since 1980.
